turkish_example_sentence: Siz danışmandan uzun vadeli finansal plan sormanız lazım.
english_example_sentence: You need to ask the consultant about a long-term financial plan.
russian_example_sentence: Вам нужно спросить у консультанта о долгосрочном финансовом плане.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Siz danışmandan uzun vadeli finansal plan ______ lazım.
